page.title: 04RIVERS IN CLATFORD
page.content: There are two rivers running through our patch. The{RIVER ANTON}runs through {GOODWORTH CLATFORD. It is a tributary of the {RIVER TEST} which runs through Wherwell.It joins on to a wide flood plain.On the North side of the flood plain there is a river cliff.The rivers are famous for their trout.The {ECOLOGY}in and around is rich and varied.We went down to the river and found these animals. Fresh water shrimp,Fresh water snail, May fly larva,Cadisfly larva, Great pond snail,Ramshorn snail, We also found a few leeches. We took some samples of water weed. We saw some small trout,a coot,moorhen and mallard.
